userStories.title: Hello World (Full Stack)
userStories.story: As a developer, I want a working frontend that displays Hello World from the backend, so that I can verify the full stack communication works
acceptanceCriteria: Frontend displays the message fetched from backend
Both run locally with docker-compose up

userStories.title: Dockerize the Application
userStories.story: As a developer, I want the entire application containerized, so that I can deploy it anywhere
acceptanceCriteria: docker-compose up starts the full app on localhost

userStories.title: Deploy to VPS
userStories.story: As a developer, I want to deploy the app to my VPS, so that it's accessible on the internet
acceptanceCriteria: Auto-deploy to VPS on push to main

userStories.title: User Registration
userStories.story: As a new user, I want to create an account, so that I can use the dashboard
acceptanceCriteria: User redirected to login after signup
Verify in browser using browser tools

userStories.title: User Login
userStories.story: As a registered user, I want to log in, so that I can access my dashboard
acceptanceCriteria: Backend validates credentials and returns JWT
Verify in browser using browser tools

userStories.title: Protected Routes
userStories.story: As a user, I want my data to be private, so that only I can see my content
acceptanceCriteria: Frontend redirects to login if not authenticated
Each user sees only their own data
Verify in browser using browser tools

userStories.title: Configure Jellyfin Connection
userStories.story: As a user, I want to input my Jellyfin API key and URL, so that the app can fetch my library data
acceptanceCriteria: Settings page with form for Jellyfin URL and API key
Verify in browser using browser tools

userStories.title: Configure Jellyseerr Connection
userStories.story: As a user, I want to input my Jellyseerr API key and URL, so that the app can fetch my requests data
acceptanceCriteria: Settings page with form for Jellyseerr URL and API key
Verify in browser using browser tools

userStories.title: View Old Unwatched Content
userStories.story: As a user, I want to see a list of content not watched in 4+ months, so that I can decide what to delete
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard shows list of old/unwatched movies and series
Each item shows: name, type, year, size, last watched date, path
Total count and total size displayed
Verify in browser using browser tools

userStories.title: Delete Content from Jellyfin
userStories.story: As a user, I want to delete a movie/series directly from the dashboard, so that I don't have to go to Jellyfin
acceptanceCriteria: Delete button on each content item
Backend calls Jellyfin API to delete
Item removed from list after deletion
Verify in browser using browser tools

userStories.title: Protect Content from Deletion
userStories.story: As a user, I want to add content to a whitelist, so that it won't appear in the to delete list
acceptanceCriteria: Protect button on each content item
Item added to user's content whitelist
Protected items no longer appear in old/unwatched list
Verify in browser using browser tools

userStories.title: Manage Content Whitelist
userStories.story: As a user, I want to view and edit my content whitelist, so that I can remove protection from items
acceptanceCriteria: Whitelist page shows all protected items
Add button to manually add items by name
Verify in browser using browser tools

userStories.title: Landing Page Hero
userStories.story: As a visitor, I want to see an attractive landing page, so that I understand the value and sign up
acceptanceCriteria: Bold hero section with gradient background (blue to purple)
Tagline: Keep Your Media Library Clean
Secondary link: Already have an account? -> /login
Verify in browser using browser tools

userStories.title: Feature Highlights
userStories.story: As a visitor, I want to see the main features, so that I understand what the product does
acceptanceCriteria: Old Content, Large Files, Language Issues, Request Tracking
Verify in browser using browser tools

userStories.title: Dashboard Preview
userStories.story: As a visitor, I want to see a preview of the dashboard, so that I know what to expect
acceptanceCriteria: Verify in browser using browser tools

userStories.title: Trust Section
userStories.story: As a visitor, I want to know my data is secure, so that I feel confident signing up
acceptanceCriteria: Verify in browser using browser tools

userStories.title: Auth Page CTAs
userStories.story: As a visitor, I want clear calls-to-action on auth pages, so that I convert easily
acceptanceCriteria: Login: clear CTA and link to register
Verify in browser using browser tools

userStories.title: View Large Movies
userStories.story: As a user, I want to see movies larger than 13GB, so that I can re-download them in lower quality
acceptanceCriteria: Page shows movies exceeding size threshold
Each item shows: name, year, size, watched status
Total size of large movies displayed
Verify in browser using browser tools

userStories.title: View Content with Language Issues
userStories.story: As a user, I want to see content missing French or English audio, so that I can re-download proper versions
acceptanceCriteria: Page shows content with language problems
Shows which languages are missing (EN/FR audio, FR subs)
For series: shows which episodes have issues
Verify in browser using browser tools

userStories.title: Mark Content as French-Only
userStories.story: As a user, I want to mark French films as not needing English audio, so that they don't appear as language issues
acceptanceCriteria: Item no longer flagged for missing English
Verify in browser using browser tools

userStories.title: Exempt Content from Language Checks
userStories.story: As a user, I want to completely exempt content from language checks, so that special cases don't show as issues
acceptanceCriteria: Item no longer appears in language issues
Verify in browser using browser tools

userStories.title: View Unavailable Requests
userStories.story: As a user, I want to see Jellyseerr requests that aren't available, so that I can manually find them
acceptanceCriteria: Page shows requests with unavailable status
Shows: title, type, requested by, request date
For TV: shows which seasons are missing
Verify in browser using browser tools

userStories.title: View Currently Airing Series
userStories.story: As a user, I want to see series that are currently airing, so that I know new episodes are coming
acceptanceCriteria: Shows: title, current season, episodes aired/total
Verify in browser using browser tools

userStories.title: View Recently Available Content
userStories.story: As a user, I want to see what became available this week, so that I can notify my friends
acceptanceCriteria: Page shows content available in past 7 days
Verify in browser using browser tools

userStories.title: Automatic Daily Data Sync
userStories.story: As a user, I want my data to refresh automatically every day, so that the dashboard is always up-to-date
acceptanceCriteria: Background task runs daily per user
Fetches data from Jellyfin and Jellyseerr

userStories.title: Manual Data Refresh
userStories.story: As a user, I want to manually trigger a data refresh, so that I can see changes immediately
acceptanceCriteria: Rate limited to prevent API abuse
Verify in browser using browser tools

userStories.title: Configure Thresholds
userStories.story: As a user, I want to customize analysis thresholds, so that the dashboard matches my preferences
acceptanceCriteria: Settings for: months cutoff, min age, large movie size
Verify in browser using browser tools
